title: Let us Lower the Speed Limit(Social Issue)
body:
I read on the news that so many people die from getting in a car accident. This can all be prevented if people go slower but people don't care until they get into a accident. I say, Lets reduce all speed limits 

New Speed Limits

Interstate - 55 Miles Per hour
Local High Way - 45 Miles Per Hour
Schools, near parks, neighborhoods, parking lots or near office buildings - 7 Miles per hour
Any where else 30 Miles Per Hour

Any one who breaks this law (Speeds more than 5 miles over)gets 3 days  in prison.

Thoughts?
